definition: small carnivorous freshwater percoid fishes of North America usually having a laterally compressed body and metallic luster: crappies
details:
noun
- small carnivorous freshwater percoid fishes of North America usually having a laterally compressed body and metallic luster: crappies
= synonyms: centrarchid
- among the largest bony fish
= synonyms: ocean sunfish, mola, headfish
- the lean flesh of any of numerous American perch-like fishes of the family Centrarchidae
